title: Getting out of the cube (the day before the Pre-Con)
excerpt: Traveling to Atlanta, Georgia for the Atalanta BI SQL Saturday. Doing a Pre-Conference talk on Friday (all day talk) and a main session on Saturday. This was the day I arrived and met up with my Co-Presenter (Patrick LeBlanc).  A day in the life of Adam...  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1
